Notes
Model class for storing note information in the application.
NotesAPI
API utility class for handling note summaries with Gemini.
NotesAPI.Content
Inner class representing a note summary object returned from Gemini.
NotesLibraryController
Controller for the notes library page.

Model class for storing summarized notes in the application.

Controller for the note summary page.

Singleton manager class for handling the current NoteSummary.

Model class for storing quiz information in the application.

API utility class for generating and parsing quizzes with Gemini.
QuizAPI.McqItem
Model class representing a single multiple-choice question item.

Main entry point for the Quiz application.
